data.description: Yet another procmail alike for to split mail
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Well, Mail::Procmail which would be my first choice is taken.

    My module is different from those listed above in that it
    consciously tries to preserve procmail features and the procmail way
    of doing things, while coupling this with Perl's saner syntax.
